title.narrative: Support to Local Government Units for more effective and accountable PFM

description.narrative: The PFM support project will mainly be directed towards strengthening LGU PFM functions to increase allocative efficiency, operational effectiveness and efficiency and transparency and accountability for results.

participating-org.narrative: European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)
European Commission - Directorate-General for International Partnerships (INTPA)

title.narrative: Capacities of the National Oversight Bodies to deliver on their mandate of Local Government Unit (LGU) Public Financial Management (PFM)_x000D Log Frame_x000D_

title.narrative: Capacities of the National Oversight Bodies to deliver on their mandate of Local Government Unit (LGU) Public Financial Management (PFM)_x000D Log Frame_x000D_

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

baseline.value: Inter Agency [negative] competition and inffective communications

comment.narrative: Inter Agency [negative] competition and inffective communications

target.value: National oversight bodies have the capacities to deliver on their mandate of LGU PFM

comment.narrative: National oversight bodies have the capacities to deliver on their mandate of LGU PFM

actual.value: The national inter-agency teams and regional inter-agency teams were established and follow-up on the quality and harmonised procedures for PFM in the LGUs.
